page.title: 01The village of Childs Ercall
page.content: Our community is rural. The main village is Childs Ercall, with a small village called Ollerton.Childs Ercall has got a school a church and two village halls, one of the halls is used for mothers and toddlers, Bingo and an old peoples club. The other hall is used for disco's and community recreation.{In 1983 there were 596 {people in Childs Ercall}.There was an old airfield and buildings _ huts that were taken over by squatters than all buildings and huts were knocked down and it was made into a council estate, some of the houses have now been bought by tentants.There are about 12 farms in our area.The hall is lived in by mr and mrs Thornicroft part of the hall has been made into flats.
